PlaceholderSigrid: ^Sigrid? I have a package for you.

c-0: ^Somebody's gotta keep an eye on all the boats around here.
c-1: ^Pretty big place for just one person, right?
^Lighthouse keepers aren't typically the social type. That applies to me too..
^So there's no need to be concerned, if that's why you're asking.
^Still, I wouldn't say no to the occasional visit every now and then.
^As long as you bring coffee, that is. I've got a limited supply here.
c-2: ^Now that you mention it, I could use some help.
^I have this package that needs to get to Irma. Want to take it on for me?
g-1: ^Great. It's nice to have some help.
^She lives to the southwest of here.
^You can tell her island apart by the big antannae.
^Also the rocks. There are a lot of rocks.
